content: Be sure to follow the path of the brook to harvest more plants and deal with Frozen Corpses and Golden Lotus Guai along the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to follow the path of the brook to harvest more plants and deal with Frozen Corpses and Golden Lotus Guai along the way.
